issue.title: Remove header from image.proto. Remove time from image_stamped.proto

content.raw:
Also, I don't think multiple headers is necessarily a bad thing because:

1. The timestamp is one part of a header. A header can can other additional information.
2. Timestamps are often used to mark when data was generated. This means embedded/nested messages could have multiple different timestamps.
content.html:
Also, I don't think multiple headers is necessarily a bad thing because:

  1. The timestamp is one part of a header. A header can can other additional information.
  2. Timestamps are often used to mark when data was generated. This means embedded/nested messages could have multiple different timestamps.
